Kirti Bhushan Mishra

Professor at IIT Roorkee

About

Kirti Bhushan Mishra, an Assistant Professor, is an eminent figure in the realm of mechanical engineering. His profound research interests encompass Combustion and Fuels, Fire and Explosion Safety, Disaster/Incident modeling and prevention, and CFD. Dr. Mishra's academic journey is highlighted by a Ph.D. in Combustion and Fire Safety from the University of Duisburg-Essen, Germany, along with an M.Tech in Fluid Mechanics and Machines from MA-NIT, Bhopal, India, and a B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from RGPV, Bhopal, India. His remarkable contributions in areas critical to safety and combustion have solidified his reputation as a leader in the field of mechanical engineering.

Research Interest

Combustion and Fuels, Fire and Explosion Safety, Disaster/Incident modelling and prevention, CFD
